posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Complaints and burdens: Always falling on me
posts.body:
Even when I'm fair, I'm still blamed,
people expect perfection and always want more,
why am I the one accused or pressured?
I carry hate, work hard, and still it's not enough.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Why does everything fall on me?
posts.body:
I’m often forced to accept tasks others reject,
I try to be responsible, but get blamed when things go wrong,
people don’t understand the effort it takes,
and yet, they expect me to fix everything.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Frustration and anger
posts.body:
I’m tired of apologizing and doing everything,
others take advantage while I stay quiet,
why do I always have to fix their mistakes?
The pain and responsibility are too much.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Suffering in silence
posts.body:
My body is exhausted and my mind tired,
we try to stay strong even when hurting inside,
we get blamed and misunderstood,
but still we carry on with the pain and the work.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Why is it always difficult?
posts.body:
Life keeps throwing problems our way,
some people act like they care, but don’t really help,
and when trouble comes, they disappear,
we’re left to deal with it alone again.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Pain behind the smile
posts.body:
We try to look strong on the outside,
but our hearts are tired from carrying pain,
every day we hide what we feel,
and yet, life keeps challenging us more.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Legal problems, temporary fixes, and frustrations
posts.body:
People know what’s right, but still ignore it,
we're promised change but get the same results,
temporary solutions just delay real progress,
and we suffer the consequences.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Annoyances and mistakes we endure
posts.body:
We deal with poor service and wrong decisions,
we're forced to stay silent when things go bad,
we sit through the errors,
and no one is held accountable.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Recognizing and praising the good
posts.body:
Some people still care and do what’s right,
we see kindness and honesty in them,
they help even when no one’s watching,
and that gives us hope for the community.

posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
posts.title: Old problems still not solved
posts.body:
These issues have been around for a long time,
and yet, no real solution has been done,
it’s frustrating when no one listens,
even when the problems are clear and serious.

posts.title: Hoping
posts.body: mo send ba kaha nis json?
posts.name: Nycel Bantilan
